data.name: Tales of Terror
data.detailed_description:
Tales of Terror is a co-op or PvP horror survival game. Work together to survive, Use a variety of items, solve the mystery and escape… if you can! Or play as the monster and stop the Survivors from escaping!

Friendship is key!

PVE online cooperative play!
Play with up to 4 friends. Work together to solve the mystery, find items along the way to help you and escape all together if you can!

Single player mode!
Looking for a challenge? See if you can handle the onslaught by yourself!

PVP Mode!
Human Side
Work together just like before in PVE but this time its PVP and the monster is being controlled by one of you!

Monster Side
Play as the monsters. Juggle through different unique monster classes with unique abilities. You have one goal… Devour all Survivors!

Actively combat against your foes
May the best player win. Will it be the monster or will it be the survivors? Play against them in real time.
